creator: slei015@ec.auckland.ac.nz
text:
Jmeter does not record calculated values such as throughput in the output CSV
file. The Summary Report listener should record all calculated values, such as
throughput, into the output CSV file.

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
Possible since release 2.3.2
=> "Save Table Data" buttons to Aggregate and Summary Reports - save table as CSV format with header
